short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to save job designation, company name, and location from Indeed and LinkedIn in excel format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supports saving the copied data locally in Chrome storage.
Users can download the saved data as a CSV file.
Automatically distinguishes between data copied from Indeed and LinkedIn.
